Pengusaha Minta Promosi Wisata Digenjot Jelang Libur Akhir Tahun
07 Nov 2019, 09:58 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Ilustrasi/Foto: BBC Magazine

Jakarta - Ketua umum Kamar Dagang Industri (Kadin) Indonesia Rosan Roeslani mengatakan bahwa sektor pariwisata menjadi industri yang paling menjanjikan di akhir tahun. Rosan memaparkan bahwa banyak turis asing yang mulai ancang-ancang untuk menikmati liburan ke negara tropis."Liburan anak sekolah ini kan Desember, bulan Desember ini juga bagus menarik devisa. Karena di luar negeri ini musim dingin," ucap Rosan ditemui di sela kegiatan Rakornas Ekonomi Kreatif Kadin 2019, di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Rosan mencontohkan turis asing dari Rusia misalnya, kebanyakan menurutnya akan berlibur di antara bulan November, Desember, ataupun Januari. Untuk itu dia pun meminta pemerintah untuk menggenjot promosi pariwisata ke Eropa dan Amerika."Kalau lihat datanya orang Rusia itu ya paling banyak datang (berlibur ke Indonesia) di bulan November, Desember, hingga Januari. Maka, kita mesti pinter juga nih, oh ini musim dingin kita harus aktif untuk mendorong promosinya," ucap Rosan.Ia meminta Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif menggenjot promosi agar kunjungan turis bisa meningkat."Menurut saya kalau dari pariwisata (Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif) harus didorong ini," lanjutnya. Businessmen Ask for Tourism Promotion Boosted Before the End of Year Holidays
Nov 7 2019, 09:58 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Illustration / Photo: BBC Magazine

Jakarta - Chairperson of the Indonesian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (Kadin) Rosan Roeslani said that the tourism sector became the most promising industry at the end of the year. Rosan explained that many foreign tourists began to square off to enjoy a vacation to a tropical country. "This schoolchild's vacation is December, this December is also good at attracting foreign exchange. Because overseas is winter," said Rosan found in between Rakornas activities Kadin Creative Economy 2019, at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). The example exemplifies foreign tourists from Russia, for example, most of whom will be on vacation between November, December, or January. For that he also asked the government to boost tourism promotion to Europe and America. "If you see the data, the Russians come most (on holiday to Indonesia) in November, December, until January. So, we must be smart too, oh this winter we must be active to encourage its promotion, "said Rosan. He asked the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy to boost promotion so that tourist visits could increase." In my opinion if tourism (the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy) should be encouraged, "he continued.
